FilePublisherRule.Name: Default Rule to allow Microsoft publisher
FilePublisherRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run desktop apps that are signed with Microsoft publisher.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All files
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all applications.
